1.content: Update database schema for new pricing structure
1.details: Add/update tables for: Individual Plan ($99/month), Additional Assignable User ($59/month), Firm Plan ($249/month), and Enterprise lead capture

2.content: Create Stripe products and pricing setup
2.details: Set up Stripe products, prices, and webhook handling for the new 3-tier structure. All credentials now available.

3.content: Update sales page and subscription UI
3.details: Update frontend components to reflect new pricing: Individual ($99), Additional User ($59), Firm ($249), Enterprise contact form

4.content: üéØ HIGH PRIORITY: Update Pricing Components with Final Tiers
4.details: Update all pricing displays, sales pages, subscription components, and Stripe integration to reflect the finalized 3-tier structure: Individual ($99/month), Additional Assignable User ($59/month), Firm ($249/month), plus Enterprise contact section. Ensure consistency across all pricing references in the system.

5.content: üí∞ MEDIUM PRIORITY: Implement AI Token Usage Tracking & Billing
5.details: AI services are operational but lack token consumption tracking and billing limits. Implement token usage monitoring, subscription-based limits, and overage billing to prevent abuse and enable monetization.

6.content: üì± MEDIUM PRIORITY: Complete Navigation Mobile Responsiveness
6.details: Add missing accordion behavior for mobile navigation, implement Financials submenu structure, and ensure all navigation elements are fully responsive across devices. Current implementation is 70% complete.

7.content: üìÅ MEDIUM PRIORITY: Fix Document Upload Service Integration
7.details: Document upload service is currently simulating file operations rather than persisting to Supabase Storage. Verify and fix the document upload pipeline to ensure files are properly stored and retrievable.

8.content: üó∫Ô∏è MEDIUM PRIORITY: Fix Google Maps Address Autocomplete Integration
8.details: Address autocomplete functionality is failing due to Google Maps API integration issues. Verify API keys, configure billing, and ensure proper implementation of Google Places API for address suggestions.

9.content: üí≥ LOW PRIORITY: Complete Subscription Enforcement Logic
9.details: Database and Stripe infrastructure for subscriptions is implemented (80% complete), but needs enforcement logic for feature access based on subscription tiers. Implement subscription-based feature gating and usage limits.

10.content: üìû LOW PRIORITY: Implement Professional Phone Number System
10.details: Current phone input works but lacks advanced formatting, validation, and multi-phone support. Enhance with better formatting, type classification (mobile/landline/fax), and support for multiple phone numbers per contact.

11.content: ‚ö° LOW PRIORITY: Build Custom Workflow Engine
11.details: Add n8n.io style drag-and-drop workflow builder for custom automation sequences. This would allow users to create custom triggers, actions, and conditional logic flows for business process automation.

12.details: Add Content Security Policy (CSP), HSTS, and other security headers to protect against XSS, clickjacking, and other web vulnerabilities. Configure proper CORS policies for production environment.

13.details: Configure automated deployment pipeline with staging and production environments. Implement automated testing, build optimization, and rollback capabilities for reliable deployments.

14.content: üìä MONITORING: Implement Error Tracking & Performance Monitoring
14.details: Add comprehensive error tracking (Sentry), performance monitoring, and user analytics. Set up alerts for critical errors and performance degradation to maintain high availability.

15.details: Perform comprehensive testing of all user workflows: claim intake, client management, document processing, financial calculations, and vendor coordination. Document any remaining bugs or inconsistencies.

16.content: üìñ DOCUMENTATION: Create User Documentation & Training Materials
16.details: Develop comprehensive user guides, video tutorials, and training materials for all major features. Create admin documentation for system configuration and maintenance procedures.
